name: The light in the end of the tunnel
name_original: The light in the end of the tunnel
description:
This is a game from the first person. You are running forward, there are three rows, you can change the row using Left and Right Arrow Buttons. Also you can jump using Up Arrow Button and sit down (or stand up) using Down Arrow Button. The coins can increase your score. Avoid the obstacles. Try to get as much score as you can.

Press Win+D to hide the game; Alt+F4 to close the game
